snippet: Last year I wrote a short post about the embossed design that is imprinted on the traditional Oreo cookie wafers. I say "traditional" because after listening to a podcast earlier this week from NPR, there seems to be more a new form entirely for this...
abstract: Last year I wrote a short post about the embossed design that is imprinted on the traditional Oreo cookie wafers. I say "traditional" because after listening to a podcast earlier this week from NPR, there seems to be more a new form entirely for this American staple. Chances are, you won't see it on shelf near you, unless you're in China.
lead_paragraph: Last year, I wrote a short post about the embossed design that is imprinted on the traditional Oreo cookie wafers. I say "traditional" because after listening to a podcast earlier this week from NPR, there seems to be a new form in the works for this American staple. Chances are, you won't see it on shelf near you, unless you live in China.

headline.main: The New Oreo: Form Follows Frosting
